notes_text: Opiates, cannabis and other plants containing psychotropic substances are illegal.
notes: Opiates, cannabis and other plants containing psychotropic substances are illegal.
notes_raw: {{main|Cannabis in Uzbekistan}} Opiates, cannabis and other plants containing psychotropic substances are illegal.<ref>{{cite web |url = http://www.lex.uz/Pages/GetAct.aspx?lact_id=111453 |title = Criminal Code of the Republic of Uzbekistan |access-date = 2 August 2013 |language = uz |publisher = The national database of legislation of the Republic of Uzbekistan |archive-date = 26 December 2018 |archive-url = https://web.archive.org/web/20181226021514/http://www.lex.uz/acts/111453 |url-status = live }}</ref>
